definition.text: This is the Governance Project! Today I will help you create a User Profile and join the first few Governance Programs!

paragraphs.text: But before you start, you should know that you may only submit your profile to the Develop branch, so it's time to switch!

Go to the footer and switch both the Contributions Branch and the Current Branch to Develop. Then close and restart the app after the switch!

Once you're back, run the app.update command to get up to date with Develop, restart, and only then may you proceed with this tutorial!
